Events that occurred on 7 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1896 - Hugo Dyson is born.
1928 - The Tablet reports about J.R.R. Tolkien's paper "The Chill Barbarians of the North".
1948 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 114.
1971 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Randy Trimmer.
1987 - Actor Ismael Cruz Córdova is born.
2006 - The Tolkien Ensemble publish their collected work, Complete Songs & Poems.
2016 - A Secret Vice: Tolkien on Invented Languages is published.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2510:
Eorl the Young and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
Full Moon[1]
